list.title: Parameter List
list.allowLessQuantity: Allow Less Quantity Based On Order
list.allowMoreQuantity: Allow More Quantity Based On Order
list.error: An error occurred while loading data

form.allowLessQuantity: Allow Less Quantity Based On Order
form.allowLessQuantityDescription: Allows entering less quantity than the order. When this option is active, quantities less than the order quantity can be entered.
form.allowMoreQuantity: Allow More Quantity Based On Order
form.allowMoreQuantityDescription: Allows entering more quantity than the order. When this option is active, quantities more than the order quantity can be entered.
form.requireApprovalDescription: Requires approval before sending to ERP system. When this option is active, transactions go through an approval process before being sent to ERP.
form.requireAllOrderItemsCollectedDescription: When this parameter is active, all items in the order must be collected.
form.editDescription: You can edit existing parameter settings
form.createDescription: You can create new parameter settings
